lead_paragraph: A public service advertisement encouraging college students to get swine flu shots to prevent a third wave of the epidemic was released Thursday by the Department of Health and Human Services.
snippet: A public service advertisement encouraging college students to get swine flu shots to prevent a third wave of the epidemic was released Thursday by the Department of Health and Human Services.

headline.main: New Campaign Urges Flu Shots at Colleges
headline.print_headline: New Campaign Urges Flu Shots at Colleges
